pages.description:
With hunger gnawing at your stomache you spot a birds nest.

The trunk doen'st seem to thick, but it will probably hold you...
Slender branches sway. Bough bowing under your weight. Yet it manages to hold and you find a few eggs in the nest.

Just out of grasp. You need to climb a little higher...

*SNAP*

the branch breaks at its apex!

You fall down, the powdered snow cushioning the death blow.



 -5 Health
